description:
Nestled on a huge 825sqm (approx.) block that enjoys a high position in Heathridge and benefits from exciting R30 zoning and plentiful subdivision possibilities, this solid 4 bedroom 1 bathroom family home gives you so much to look forward to.

The larger master bedroom is the pick of the sleeping quarters with its very own split-system air-conditioning unit. A stylish and fully-tiled bathroom has been impressively renovated to include a shower, vanity and heaps of under-bench storage.

Everyone can enjoy the two large separate living zones here, inclusive of a crisply-tiled and welcoming front lounge room with another split-system air-conditioning unit for climate control. The latter leads through to the spacious open-plan dining, kitchen and family area, where most of your casual time will be spent.

The kitchen has also been modernised to include sparkling dark-granite bench tops, a breakfast bar for quick bites, integrated range-hood, gas-cooktop and oven appliances, a stainless-steel dishwasher, pantry storage and seemingly-endless built-in cupboard space.

The backyard off the main living space is enormous, with expansive rear lawns providing the picturesque backdrop to outdoor entertaining under a fabulous flat patio. There is also a separate powered double garage-come-workshop on the other side of the house, for good measure.

In terms of location, a plethora of lush local parklands can be found nearby (including the sprawling Prince Regent Park around the corner), as can bus stops, Poseidon Primary School, the Heathridge Community Centre, the Heathridge Village Shopping Centre, restaurants, world-class golf at Joondalup Resort, Edgewater Train Station and even the freeway. Just a few minutes further lie the likes of Lakeside Joondalup Shopping City, Ocean Reef Senior High School, Prendiville Catholic College, St Simon Peter Catholic Primary School, pristine northern-suburbs' swimming beaches and the site of the magnificent Ocean Reef Boat Harbour redevelopment. This is one property that promises plenty. Now it's up to you to take full advantage!

Other features include, but are not limited to:

• Great tenants wishing to stay on for investors
• Wooden flooring to the master, second and third bedrooms
• Carpeted 4th bedroom
• Double built-in robes to the 2nd/3rd/4th bedrooms
• Built-in family-room storage - plus direct patio/backyard access
• Fully-tiled laundry with storage and external access
• Down lights
• Feature skirting boards
• Security doors and screens
• Garden shed
• Ample driveway parking space
• Subdivision concept plan keeping the current home available on request
• Heaps of room for a future swimming pool or "granny flat" - if not subdividing straight away
